mapper.select:
select rt.ID, rt.Name, rt.Area, rt.Job_Responsibilities, rt.Job_Requirements, rt.Statu, rt.CreateTime,rt.Opt_Date,rt.Opt_Id,a.adminName from Recruitment rt LEFT JOIN Admin a on a.ID=rt.Opt_Id
rt.Name like '%{map.name}%'
and rt.Statu=#{map.statu}
order by rt.CreateTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into Recruitment(ID, Name, Area, Job_Responsibilities, Job_Requirements, Opt_Id) values(#{id},#{name},#{area},#{jobResponsibilities},#{jobRequirements},#{optId})
mapper.select: select ID, Name, Area, Job_Responsibilities, Job_Requirements, Statu, CreateTime,Opt_Date,Opt_Id from Recruitment where Name=#{name} and ID !=#{id}
mapper.update:
update Recruitment
Name=#{name},
Area=#{area},
Job_Responsibilities=#{jobResponsibilities},
Job_Responsibilities=#{jobResponsibilities},
Opt_Id=#{optId},

where ID=#{id}
